member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService
member.summary: Provides methods to manage file cabinet records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CreateRecord(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Decimal,System.Char)
member.summary: Creates a new record.
member.returns: The ID of the created record.
member.exception: Thrown when one of the parameters is invalid.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.EditRecord(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Decimal,System.Char)
member.summary: Edits an existing record.
member.exception: Thrown when one of the parameters is invalid or the record does not exist.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds records by first name.
member.returns: An array of records with the specified first name.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByLastName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds records by last name.
member.returns: An array of records with the specified last name.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByDateOfBirth(System.String)
member.summary: Finds records by date of birth.
member.param: Date of birth to search for.
member.returns: An array of records with the specified date of birth.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.GetRecords
member.summary: Gets all records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.GetStat
member.summary: Gets the total number of records.

member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.IFileCabinetService
member.summary: Provides methods for managing file cabinet records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.IFileCabinetService.CreateRecord(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Decimal,System.Char)
member.summary: Creates a new record in the file cabinet.
member.param: The first name of the record.
The last name of the record.
The date of birth of the record.
member.returns: The ID of the created record.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.IFileCabinetService.EditRecord(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Decimal,System.Char)
member.summary: Edits an existing record in the file cabinet.
member.param: The ID of the record to edit.
The first name of the record.
The last name of the record.
The date of birth of the record.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.IFileCabinetService.GetRecords
member.summary: Gets all records from the file cabinet.
member.returns: A read-only collection of file cabinet records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.IFileCabinetService.GetStat
member.summary: Gets the number of records in the file cabinet.
member.returns: The number of records in the file cabinet.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.IFileCabinetService.FindByFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds records by first name.

member.returns: A read-only collection of records with the specified first name.

member.summary: Finds records by last name.

member.returns: A read-only collection of records with the specified last name.

member.summary: Finds records by date of birth.
member.param: The date of birth to search for.
member.returns: A read-only collection of records with the specified date of birth.
